intro: Atragene tianschanica, commonly known as the Tianshan astragalus, is a flowering plant native to Central Asia, particularly the Tianshan mountain range. It belongs to the legume family, Fabaceae, and is characterized by its compound leaves and small, yellowish flowers. The plant is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments, often growing in rocky or sandy soils. It plays a role in soil stabilization and is of interest for its potential medicinal properties.
